"決断の日":
"\"Naberius. Where we promised. I'll be waiting.\"
Words spoken by 【Persona】.
That makes your next destination obvious.
Ten years ago, a single promise was made
on Naberius. A promise with her.

A promise that only two people should know.
All will be revealed at the fated reunion.
――――――――――――――――――――
Fracaso: Retirarse después de ser incapacitado"
